Features/Skills
Paladin Features: Armor Proficiency (All); Continuous Training; Cure Disease; Deadly Lancer; Detect Evil; Diehard; Discriminating; Divine Health; Divine Protection; Equestrian; Fast Ride; Fear Immunity; Fighting The Unskilled; Lance Expertise; Lay On Hands; Mace Expertise; Mental Resistance; Mount Knowledge; Mounted Combatant; Non-Materialist; Philanthropist; Protection From Evil; Quick Mount; Shield Proficiency (All); Special Mount; Summon Warhorse; Sword Expertise; Turn Undead
Feature Notes:
Discriminating: Must not associate w/non-good characters
Mount Knowledge: Knows basic worth of mounts
Non-Materialist: Owns at most 10 magic items w/1 armor suit and 1 shield
Philanthropist: Must donate 10% of income plus 100% after expenses to LG causes
Summon Warhorse: Call warhorse w/enhanced features
Languages: Common; Hobgoblin; Orc; Treant
Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3
Equestrian: -4% chance of being unsaddled or being injured when mount falls
Fast Ride: Can ride at +2" pace for 1 hr
Quick Mount: Can vault into saddle and ride in 1 seg
Special Mount: Can ride a pegasus, hippogriff, or griffin
Combat
Hit Points: 89 Armor Class: 2 Attacks Per Round: 2.5 THAC0 Melee/Ranged: 4/4 THAC10 Melee/Ranged: -6/-6
Armor: Plate Shield: None Weapons: Composite Long Bow (+0 d6 R60'); Glaive (+0 d6); Unarmed (+0 d2)
Weapon Proficiency Count: 10 Weapon Proficiency: Composite Long Bow; Dart; Glaive; Guisarme-Voulge; Horseman's Flail; Light Crossbow; Morning Star; Partisan; Spetum; Unarmed
Turn Undead:
Fiend: 13 Ghast: D Ghost: 7 Ghoul: D Lich: 10 Mummy: T Shadow: D Skeleton: D Spectre: T Vampire: 4 Wight: D Wraith: D Zombie: D
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +9
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: -1
Deadly Lancer: +20 lance damage when mounted, +1 dismounted
Diehard: Remains conscious at negative HP
Fighting The Unskilled: 20 attacks/rd vs. creatures with w/HD less than 1d8
Lance Expertise: +4 attack with lance when mounted, or parry for foe -4 attack
Mace Expertise: +3 attack with choice of horseman's mace, flail, or military pick, or parry for foe -3 attack
Mounted Combatant: +1 attack from mount
Sword Expertise: +3 attack with choice of broad sword, long sword, or scimitar, or parry for foe -3 attack
Turn Undead: 2d6 undead turned, destroyed (good) or controlled (evil)
Save: Breath: 4; Death: 3; Petrification: 4; Spell: 6; Wand: 5 Survive Resurrection: 94% Survive System Shock: 91%
Save Notes:
Divine Health: Immune to disease
Divine Protection: +2 all saves
Fear Immunity: R10' Immune to fear
Mental Resistance: 90% resistance to mental attacks, +2 vs. illusions
Magic
Spell Slots: C1: 3; C2: 3; C3: 3; C4: 3
Spells:
Bless (C1 Conj): R60' Unengaged allies in 50' sq gain +1 attack and morale (Reverse foes -1) for 6 rd
Command (C1 Ench): R10' Target obeys single-word command from self (Save neg for Intelligence 13+ or HD 6+)
Create Water (C1 Alte): R10' Creates (Reverse destroys) 48 gallons of potable water
Detect Charm (C2 Divi): Self discerns 10 charmed creatures in 30' radius for 1 tn (Reverse shields 1 target)
Detect Lie (C4 Divi): R30' Target discerns lies for 12 rd (Reverse makes lies believable)
Feign Death (C3 Necr): Willing touched appears dead, takes half damage, gains immunity to draining for 22 rd
Glyph Of Warding (C3 Abju): 300' sq inflicts 24 HP (Save half) when touched
Hold Person (C2 Ench): R60' Immobilizes 1-3 medium targets for 16 rd (Save neg)
Prayer (C3 Conj): R60' Allies gain +1 attack, damage, and saves, and foes -1, for 12 rd
Protection From Evil 10' Radius (C4 Abju): Creatures in 10' radius of touched become untouchable by evil outsiders and gain +2 saves vs. evil, and evil foes suffer -2 attacks, for 12 tn (Reverse good)
Spiritual Hammer (C2 Evoc): R30' Magical force attacks for conc or 12 rd
Tongues (C4 Alte): R30' Self converses in any language (Reverse muddles) for 1 tn
Magic Notes:
Cure Disease: Cure Disease 4/wk
Detect Evil: R60' Detect Evil at will
Lay On Hands: Touch heals 40 HP 1/dy
Protection From Evil: Continuous Protection From Evil 10' radius
